channel.title: IFTTT Notification :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: IFTTT is free service up to 5 applets IFTTT is a wrapper that allows several kind of notifications, please refer to it documentation. ESP3D use the webhook method. 1 - If you do not have IFTTT account you can create for free to use up to 5 applets. 2 - Create New applet Create new trigger The trigger is a webhook Choose Web request Set the event name Define the action you want Select the service you want to use
